phrases: A Village Out in the Boonies: Hage
Are they brothers... or perhaps twins?
This one is rather calm, but this one...
seems like he has a lot of spunk.
First of all, they do not look a thing alike.
And the spunky one over here is
You are a bit too spunky...
You two do not need to worry about a thing anymore.
Starting today, this is your new home...
Hopefully, we will have a great harvest this year.
Must be that runt from the church again.
I will become the Wizard King someday and make you happy!
I am sorry, Asta, but I am everyone is sister.
I am not giving up yet!
Water Creation Magic: Holy Fist of Love!
I used magic from my grimoire without thinking...
How many times does she have to dump you?
Why are you getting in my way too, Yuno?!
Basically, you are not appealing to women in any way.
Is that what you say to someone you have grown up with
for the past fifteen years, you handsome jerk?!
Let me give you a hand.
Do not ignore me, damn it!
Asta, Sister Lily is a woman of the cloth, so she cannot get married.
Also, you are only fifteen, so you cannot get married anyway.
I challenge you to a fight, Yuno!
Because it is a waste of time.
There is no way you can beat Yuno.
I mean, you cannot even use magic.
It is hard to believe someone your age cannot use magic yet.
How dare you speak to your elders that way?!
Magic is everything in this world.
It is only natural to be able to use magic.
You are the only one I have ever seen who cannot use it, Asta.
G-Guess I do not have a choice...
I will have to show you what I am really made of...
What you are really made of?
I know you cannot do sit-ups this fast!
What is your point, you idiot?
He is such a great help.
I still cannot believe you two are the same age.
Yuno is the hope of this church!
I will not be surprised if you end up joining
the Magic Knights who serve the Wizard King, Yuno!
The awarding ceremony is coming up, Asta.
it should trigger something within you, and you should be able to use magic, too.
I will get my grimoire soon...
I will get a grimoire that is more amazing than anyone else's,
get into the Magic Knights, follow in your footsteps,
And I will fix up this shabby, ugly church!
Well, I am sorry it is so shabby and ugly!
Is he really older than me?
Could not you be a bit nicer to Asta?
Remember how you two were always together when you were little?
Yuno used to be such a crybaby,
but ever since the day he brought Asta back with those terrible injuries,
Yuno has not cried at all.
I cannot be nicer to him.
Come to think of it, Asta has come home covered in mud ever since that day, too.
I wonder what he is doing out there...
And now for this moguro leaf juice, which is supposed to be
I am going to become the Wizard King.
That is the one thing I will never give up on!
But before that, I need to build myself up!
When firefly dandelion fluff starts to dance through the air.
Once a year, all around the Clover Kingdom, all of the 15-year-olds are gathered,
and an awarding ceremony is held, where they receive
their own grimoires, which enhance their magical powers.
Once I get my grimoire, I am sure I will be able to use magic, too.
I will catch up to Yuno in no time!
I guess today's the day I become a full-fledged mage.
They should not have to give grimoires to dregs like that.
Do not tell me they are
actually planning on taking the Magic Knights' entrance exams, too.
Only nobles born with immense magical power or ties to the royal family ever get in.
Besides, I heard that shrimp cannot even use magic!
Then we need to take good care of him.
He is like a national treasure, since he is probably
the only one in this whole kingdom who cannot use magic.
You all begin a new journey today.
I wish you all faith, hope, and love.
I am the master of this grimoire tower.
We have never had a Wizard King from this area,
nor anyone who is actually achieved greatness in the Magic Knights.
I sincerely hope that one of you will become the Wizard King someday.
for the awarding... of the grimoires!
Now I can leave this town and go to the city.
I am going to take over the family business.
I will... think about my future more once my grimoire has more pages filled in.
We will be taking the Magic Knights' entrance exams in six months.
We will be sure to get in.
If we competed to see who was most pathetic, we would be no match for that guy.
The one that the first Wizard King received?
The grimoire said to be filled with immense power and good luck?
I am going to become the Wizard King.
He is the shining star of Hage!
I will catch up to you in no time.
He did not even get a grimoire.
We are heading home to prepare for the feast!
You can each have three tatoes today!
I sure would like to eat something else once in a while.
What an amazing thing to find in a crummy little town like this.
I thought that once I got my grimoire,
I would be able to use magic, but...
I never thought I would not even get one.
But... like hell I am going to give up!
Do not you dare underestimate me, fate!
Even if it takes one, two, ten, or a hundred years!
I will keep working hard until I get my grimoire!
I will become the Wizard King, and prove to everyone that anyone can be awesome,
even if they are poor or just some orphan!
H-Hey, you do not have to go that far.
We should have been the stars today.
And yet... this peasant receives a four-leaf clover?!
I will just have to turn it into ash!
He held back my flames without even using his grimoire?!
I cannot let you go and burn that.
My Creation Magic: Binding Iron Chain
restricts the magic and movements of the one it captures.
Until recently, I was a pretty well-known Magic Knight called Revchi of Chain Magic.
But I got kicked out, so now I am just a wretched thief.
And I will be taking that grimoire.
It is pointless for you to steal that.
The only one who can use a grimoire is the one it chose.
However, underground collectors are buying grimoires
with four-leaf clovers for insane prices.
A four-leaf clover may have chosen you,
but you only just received it.
You are still just a little chick.
How unfortunate for you that I happened to be here.
Your legend is going to end before it even begins.
Hey, that pendant looks like it is worth something, too.
I guess I will be taking that...
What do you think you are doing?!
Are not you the pathetic little brat who was not even given a grimoire?
Yeah, I am that pathetic little brat!
A grimoire is precious to the person who received it!
Give it back to Yuno, you jerk!
The outside world is a place where crooked deeds like this can be overlooked.
But you will be dead before you find that out for yourself.
I am not going to run away
from a disgraced loser like him!
So this is the power of the mages from outside this town.
I cannot possibly beat him with just my physical training.
Thank you for that useless struggle, brat.
I am going to be... the Wizard King.
I have the ability to find out
just how much magical power one has with these chains.
And you have no magic whatsoever.
You must have been born that way.
No wonder you could not get a grimoire.
To think that you lack even an ounce of magic
in this world where magic is everything.
Then no matter how hard I try, I will not be able to use magic?
To think that someone so pathetic existed.
You will not even be able to find a job, let alone become the Wizard King!
I am sure your friend, the great genius over there, mocks you, too.
Yuno's so amazing that he was chosen by the four-leaf.
You cannot do a thing in this world.
No matter how hard I try, some things just cannot be helped.
I am just going to give...
Who are you calling a loser?
Asta, it is true that you will not be able to become the Wizard King,
Even your little friend is telling you it is impossible.
That is because I am going to become the Wizard King!
This brat who has no magical power whatsoever?
Sorry you had to see me looking that pathetic, Yuno.
I am going to kick this guy's butt!
There is no way that Asta would not have been chosen!
But you did not have any magic within you!
What in the world is that grimoire?!
The three leaves of the clover represent faith, hope, and love.
Within a fourth leaf dwells good luck.
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
I am not going to give up just because I cannot use magic!
It does not matter if you are a peasant or an orphan!
Anyone can shine in this world!
Black Clover, Page 2: The Boys' Promise.
Not giving up is my magic!
